auth.emailIsRequired.description: Error message when user tries to sign up without an email

auth.link.switchToSignup.description: Message to user allowing them to switch to signup with nested hyperlink

auth.login.forgotPassword.description: Allows the user to reset their password

auth.method.loginWithMetaMaskWallet.description: Button text for user to login using their MetaMask wallet instead of their email and password

auth.method.loginWithPassword.description: Button to login with email & password

auth.method.loginWithWallet.description: Button text for user to login using their MetaMask wallet instead of their email and password

auth.method.signupWithPhoneTerms.defaultMessage: By verifying your phone number, you are agreeing to our {termsOfService}.

auth.password.passwordLength.defaultMessage: Password must be at least {minLength} characters
auth.password.passwordLength.description: Error message when user tries to sign up/in with a password that is too short

auth.password.passwordMismatch.description: Error message when user tries to sign up/in with a password that does not match the password confirmation

auth.password.passwordMustContainNumber.defaultMessage: Password must contain at least one number
auth.password.passwordMustContainNumber.description: Error message when user tries to sign up/in with a password that does not contain a number

auth.password.pleaseConfirmYourPassword.description: Error message when user tries to sign up/in without a password confirmation

auth.password.pleaseEnterPassword.description: Error message when user tries to sign up/in without a password

auth.passwordIsRequired.description: Error message when user tries to sign up without a password

auth.provider.accountAlreadyExists.description: Error message when user tries to sign up with an email that already exists

auth.provider.incorrectEmailOrPassword.description: Error message when user tries to sign in with an incorrect email or password

auth.resetPassword.button.description: Button text where a user clicks to reset their password. This will send an email to them with a password reset link.

auth.resetPassword.emailSuccess.defaultMessage: A password reset email was sent to your email! Check your spam folder.
auth.resetPassword.emailSuccess.description: Message displayed when a user successfully gets a password reset email in their inbox.

auth.signup.wallet.text.description: Button text where a user clicks to sign up using their Metamask wallet

battleFeed.msg.battleFinished.description: Text indicating a tournament is finished

battleFeed.msg.startsToday.description: Text indicating a tournament or something starts today

bounty.redeem.redeemNFT.text.description: Text displayed when the user can redeem an NFT

generic.add.description: text indicating to add something to something else

generic.addLiveStream.description: Text prompting user to add a Live Stream to their tournament

generic.addWallet.description: Generic user action to add a crypto wallet to our website. This is done by connecting metamask.

generic.address.description: This is a blockchain address, usually a Metamask wallet address. (i.e. user has 0x1234567890123456789012345678901234567890 address)

generic.advancedCreate.description: Generic user action to create a new something in full

generic.anErrorOccured.description: Generic error message for when something goes wrong

generic.areYouSure.description: Generic user action to confirm something

generic.back.description: Generic user action to go back a step

generic.balance.description: Generic text for a cryptocurrency balance in a MetaMask wallet (i.e. user has 10 eth balance)

generic.battleDate.description: Date of an online esports tournament battle or 1v1

generic.bulkMintNFTs.description: Text indicating to bulk mint NFTs

generic.buyLootbox.description: Text to buy from a Lootbox using cryptocurrency.

generic.cancel.description: Generic user action to cancel something

generic.clickHere.description: Generic user action to click something. In a sentence like: "Click here to navigate to profile"

generic.clickingHere.description: Generic user action to click something. In a sentence like: "Navigate to profile by clicking here"

generic.confirmPassword.description: Password confirmation for a user account. Here they need to input the password again and make sure it is the same.

generic.connectMetamask.description: User prompting them to connect their metamask wallet to our website

generic.connectWalletToMetamask.defaultMessage: Please connect your wallet with MetaMask
generic.connectWalletToMetamask.description: User prompting them to connect their metamask wallet to our website

generic.contractAddress.description: This is a blockchain smart contract address, (i.e. smart contract has address 0x1234567890123456789012345678901234567890)

generic.copiedToClipBoard.description: Generic text indicating that something has been copied to the clipboard

generic.copy.description: Generic text indicating to copy something

generic.createAPartyBasket.description: User action to create a party basket

generic.createLootbox.description: User action to create a Lootbox

generic.createMagicLink.description: User action to create a magic link

generic.createNew.description: Generic user action to create a new something

generic.description.description: Description of something, mainly used as a header for a text input for example.

generic.edit.description: Generic user action to edit something

generic.error.description: Generic text indicating an error or a problem

generic.funded.description: Generic text indicating that something has been funded (aka. received investment)

generic.goal.description: Generic text indicating that something has a goal

generic.hide.description: Generic user action to hide something on the website

generic.learnMore.description: Generic user action to learn more about something

generic.login.description: Generic user action to login to our website

generic.logout.description: User action to logout of our website

generic.magicLink.description: Magic link is a special URL link that lets users create a Lootbox with predefined fields.

generic.manage.description: Generic user action to manage something (AKA. edit something)

generic.minted.description: Word indicating that an NFT on the blockchain has been created

generic.name.description: Generic text indicating the name of something

generic.nameCannotBeEmpty.description: Error message for user if they forgot to enter a name in a form

generic.network.description: "Network" meaning the blockchain network the user is connected to

generic.notFound.description: Generic user action to not find something

generic.partyBasket.description: This is the name of a piece of software we use to manage Lootbox bounties. In sentence: "You can redeem a Lootbox NFT from your tournament`s party basket"

generic.partyBaskets.description: Plural, This is the name of a piece of software we use to manage Lootbox bounties. In sentence: "You can redeem a Lootbox NFT from your tournament`s party basket"

generic.pleaseInstallMetamask.description: Button text prompting user to install metamask

generic.pleaseInstallMetamaskChromeExten.defaultMessage: Please install MetaMask to use this app. Use the Chrome extension or Metamask mobile app.
generic.pleaseInstallMetamaskChromeExten.description: Error message shown to user when they do not have the metamask extension installed. We suggest using a chrome extension.

generic.pleaseRefreshThePage.description: Text asking user if they can refresh the browser page.

generic.pleaseTryAgainLater.description: Generic error message for when something goes wrong, prompting the user to try again at a later time

generic.prize.description: Prize of an online esports tournament battle or 1v1, usually in crypto currency, but can also be fiat currency or anything else for that matter

generic.processing.description: Generic text indicating that something is processing

generic.readMore.description: Generic user action to read more about something

generic.receivingAddress.description: Text indicating the address of a wallet to receive something (like a crypto payment), synonymous to "receiving wallet

generic.receivingWallet.description: Text indicating the address of a wallet to receive something (like a crypto payment)

generic.register.description: User action to register for our website (synonym to sign up)

generic.rememberMe.description: Button text to remember users login details for next time. This allows the user to sign in automatically without entering a password

generic.remove.description: Generic user action to remove something

generic.reputationAddress.description: Text indicating the address that the gamer want to link their reputation to

generic.resetPassword.description: User action to reset their password

generic.rewardSponsors.description: Title which means you can reward your sponsors with crypto!

generic.search.description: Generic user action to search for something

generic.searchLootboxesByNameOrAddress.defaultMessage: Search Lootboxes by Name or Address
generic.searchLootboxesByNameOrAddress.description: Generic user action to search for Lootboxes by name or the smart contract address.

generic.shares.description: Shares are considered a portion of the Lootbox`s earnings which allows a user to share the Lootboxes / gamers profits. It is similar to the term "share" in investment, where you can buy "shares" of a company in the stock exchange.

generic.signUp.description: User action to sign up for our website (AKA: make an account or register)

generic.submitting.description: Text indicating that something is submitting

generic.switchNetwork.description: Button text prompting user to switch blockchain networks (i.e. going from Ethereum to Binance)

generic.testnet.description: "Testnet" is a blockchain specifically for testing purposes. Testnets are used to test features with fake money.

generic.title.description: Title of a Lootbox or an esports tournament etc

generic.version.description: Generic text indicating the version of something (i.e. software version of "1.0.0")

generic.view.description: Generic user action to view something, (i.e. "view Lootbox")

generic.viewOnBlockExplorer.description: Generic text indicating to view a smart contract or transaction on a block explorer (like bscscan.com)

generic.viewTransactionReceipt.description: Text indicating to view the transaction receipt

generic.wallets.description: A wallet is a cryptocurrency wallet, similar to an "address"

generic.watchTutorial.description: User prompt to watch a tutorial video

generic.win.description: Indicating to win something like a challenge

generic.wrongNetworkPleaseChangeTo.defaultMessage: You are on the wrong network! Please change your MetaMask network to
generic.wrongNetworkPleaseChangeTo.description: Text indicating you are on the wrong blockchain network. This is not a full sentence, we will show a target network immediately after. For example, "Please change your MetaMask network to (ETHEREUM)"

generics.networkNotSet.description: Error message for user if they forgot to set a blockchain network

generics.partyBasketInformation.defaultMessage: We recommend you use a Party Basket to bulk mint NFTs to your fanbase. Party baskets allow you to whitelist bounty pick-ups in batch, which means you don't need to send the NFTs manually. Instead, your fanbase can redeem the bounties themselves.

signatures.loginMessage.defaultMessage: Welcome! Sign this message to login to Lootbox. This doesn't cost you anything and is free of any gas fees.

signatures.whitelistMessage.description: Message to sign to see if you can redeem a FREE NFT from Lootbox. A signature is a cryptographic hash of a message
